about.denis: Member of the weksoftware team. Python, JavaScript developer. Works on website development, Discord bots and other projects. Developer of the AntiEvil bot.
about.mrwek: Member of the weksoftware team. PHP, Python, Lua, C++ developer and artist. Works on game development, frameworks and backend services. Project administrator of AntiEvil.
about.weksoftware: A team of developers who have been creating projects for several years that are useful to ordinary people and developers alike. Each year, weksoftware grows and helps others grow as well.
